Đăng Nhập Tạo Tài Khoản

Quên mật khẩu?
Hoặc đăng nhập với

NEW: SUPPORT PHP 8.4 & NODE 23

Powerfully Simple.
Incredibly Fast. Highly Reliable.

The universal development environment for PHP, Node.js, Python, Java, Go & Ruby. Laragon core is < 2MB and uses less than 4MB of RAM.

Miễn phí cho mọi người
Mã nguồn mở

Outstanding Performance

No more waiting when starting the server. Laragon is fully optimized to ensure your workflow is never interrupted.

No barriers

Laragon just works. Anyone can get a dev environment up and running effortlessly.

<10MB

Ultra-lightweight.The Laragon core (laragon.exe) is under 6MB and runs on just ~4 to 10MB of RAM.

100%

Startup time comparison (ms)

No more waiting when starting the server. Laragon is fully optimized.

Laragon 0.5s
XAMPP 3.2s
WAMP 4.5s

Key Features

Laragon uses native service binaries and OS-level optimizations, resulting in extremely low RAM and CPU usage.

Ultra Fast

Lightning-fast startup times and optimized performance for seamless development.

Portable

Run Laragon from any location without installation. Perfect for USB drives.

Flexible

Easily switch between PHP, MySQL, Apache, and Nginx versions with a single click.

Pretty URLs

Automatically creates virtual domains like app.test instead of localhost/app. Professional and easy to remember.

Integrated CMDER

Comes with a powerful built-in terminal supporting git, ssh, ls, and more, enabling a professional workflow.

Mail Catcher

Preview outgoing emails locally, avoiding accidental test emails sent to real customers.

Powered by Best-in-class Technology

PHP Node.js Python Go Ruby MySQL Nginx Apache

Get Started in 3 Steps

Download & Run

Download the installer or portable version. < 200MB full setup.

Start Laragon

Click "Start All". Apache/Nginx & MySQL start instantly.

Create & Code

Your environment is ready. Cmder, Git, Node are pre-loaded.

Ready to code faster?

Join thousands of developers using Laragon to speed up their web development workflow every day.

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Common questions from the community

Yes, Laragon is free and open-source.
Yes!,Laragon supports MYSQL, MairiaDB, and PostgreSQL.
Isolated service architecture prevents database corruption.
Download binary zip, extract to laragon/bin/php, and select in menu.

Choose Your Edition

Laragon Portable.zip

Self-contained. Copy folder to USB or Cloud. No installation required.

Windows 32/64 bit

Recommended

Laragon-Install.exe

Includes Apache 2.4, Nginx, MySQL 8/9, PHP 8.x, Node.js 22+, npm, git, yarn + Cmder.

Windows 32/64 bit

Outsource Service

Minimal setup. No Node.js/Git/Yarn pre-installed. Good for older machines.

Laragon

Crafted with care, driven by passion, and built for everyone, Laragon is the ultimate solution for entrepreneurs and developers who value their time. Laragon offers a streamlined development environment that works out-of-the-box, eliminating the hassle of complex setups. It's the perfect solution to help you focus on what matters most: creating, building, and innovating without wasting time on configuration.
